title: Wikipedia-Based Mathematics Learning Strategies for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A course for acquiring Wikipedia utilization strategies in mathematics learning through smartphone-based microlearning in limited-technology environments (no PC access).

learning_goals: Learners can explain ≥3 strategies for efficiently searching mathematics-related information on Wikipedia.
Learners can critically analyze Wikipedia’s mathematical content to apply methods for selecting reliable information.
Learners can reconstruct ≥80% of background knowledge required for solving mathematical problems based on Wikipedia information.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
